definition: Yuanmingyuan, the Old Summer Palace, destroyed by the British and French army in 1860
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
surname Yuan

sentences.english: We visited the ruins of the Yuanmingyuan yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天我們參觀了圓明園遺蹟。

sentences.english: Kyushu-ching Yuanmingyuan scenic feast is the largest construction group.
sentences.chinese: 九州清宴是圓明園景區中最大的建築羣。

sentences.english: The  grandeur of the  Old Summer Palace is second to none.
sentences.chinese: 圓明園的壯麗是其他園林無可比擬的。

sentences.english: Yuanmingyuan located at Beijing haidian district, west, eastern.
sentences.chinese: 圓明園位於北京市西郊，海淀區東部。

sentences.english: Yuanmingyuan, I hope that I can create a miracle, to create a new you.
sentences.chinese: 圓明園，希望我能夠創造奇蹟，製造出新的你。

sentences.english: Unquestionably, the united army is the chief criminal of the plunder.
sentences.chinese: 英法聯軍無疑是最先搶掠圓明園的罪魁禍首。

sentences.english: Yuanmingyuan court for the Southern District, the emperor is handled by the public.
sentences.chinese: 圓明園的南部爲朝廷區，是皇帝處理公務之所。

sentences.english: Mr. Xu says he has every intention of finishing his 'New Old Summer Palace.
sentences.chinese: 徐文榮說，他真心希望能完成“新圓明園”工程。

sentences.english: Whether the burned-down Yuanmingyuan should be rebuilt has been much discussed in the media.
sentences.chinese: 被燒燬的圓明園該不該重建在媒體引起了激烈討論。

sentences.english: Beijing Yuanmingyuan was burned those animals originating in the head several mountain?
sentences.chinese: 當年燒北京圓明園的那些禽獸原產於那幾個山頭兒？

sentences.english: Even more interesting is that in the Yuanmingyuan also has a Western-style garden area.
sentences.chinese: 更有趣的是，圓明園中還建有西式園林景區。
